articles.description: England face Switzerland in the quarter-finals of Euro 2024 on Saturday with more questions than answers given their performance in the tournament so far.

articles.title: Euro 2024: 'We have to accept this is England's identity' - Alan Shearer

articles.description: Premier League clubs spend about £185.5m as they scramble to comply with profit and sustainability rules.
